item.description:
** UPDATE **

feel free to arrive when you like (doors open at 6), but most of us, including the contact person for the event, Amanda O, will be arriving after 9.

also, if you don't have tickets yet, it's apparently possible to get them by doing the following:

- call 203-562-5589 (ext. #0) after 11am today (5/4) and ask for Jeff or Holli.
- tell them you want tickets for tonight's show and that the password is "kiss my blarney
stone!"
- the tickets can then be picked up at the front door of Toad's
_____________________________________________

in case you didn't get enough irish in you on St. Patrick's day, Toad's Place is having an Irish Fest on Friday, May 4. featured performers include Black 47, the Highland Rovers Band, the Sean O'Reilly Band, the Lost 45's, and the Michael Cleary Band.

apparently you can get free passes by sending an email to management [at] highlandrovers.com with a request for as many passes as you need and your home address so they can mail them out (but you'd probably want to limit it to less than three...if you're greedy it may ruin it for everyone).

alternately, if you like parting with your greenbacks, tickets are $13.50 in advance or $15.00 the day of the show from Toad's. doors open at 6, show begins at 7.

your contact for this event is Amanda O: 203-823-5332
item.name: Fri. 5/4 - Toad's Place Irish Fest with Black 47 and the Highland Rovers
